subject: Simsonn Manager 2.0.6 Software
description_text:
I have the Simsonn Pro X pedals and I am using the Simsonn manager 2.0.6
software.
I would like to notify and suggest adding functionality that
can automatically select and enable a device configuration preset when the
software is opened. Having to Manually select and enable a preset before
playing is inconvenient. Thank you for your consideration.

conversations.body_text: Hi Danny Rodriguez,  I just described this issue to our software engineer. The software does enable a default preset by default. Could you clarify which preset you're referring to? If possible, please share a video or screenshot to help us better understand your request.Â
